message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product for $1,750,000.  It's worth a great deal to both of us, and I believe this price reflects its true value.  This is a limited-time offer, as I have another buyer, John, who is also interested at a price of $1,500,000.  I'm confident this product will be a great asset to you, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
